12 prior ratings said 5 stars.  I am not sure if I am happier with Didac - the wonderful host and his girlfriend - or Yelp.  Lean in and celebrate your life and dinner companion if you can possibly surrender an evening at Estapes.  A reservation is recommended.  We got lucky.My wife and I had the tasting menu with the wine pairings.  Each wine from a different Catalan region was described with colorful notes and purpose for pairing by Didac. I covet his 600 bottle cellar. Each dish was wonderfully prepared, beautifully plated and as delicate as it was delicious. The entire meal was paced, served and balanced. Nothing pretentious about the seating but location is beautiful and every serving arrived with pride and the joy of owners doing what they love.  We left completely sated in every way.For $100 per person at the current dollar exchange rate, you will feel like you stole it.
